title: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
OB: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view is filtered.
EB: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view should be filtered.
SR:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view is filtered.
2. Open the working set dialog again, create a second working set, and then delete the first working set.
